statements: SELECT * FROM employee_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, start_date FROM employee_progress WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT end_date, progress_status FROM employee_progress WHERE start_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, completion_date FROM employee_progress WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress' AND completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date, goal_description FROM employee_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Not Started' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY completion_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date FROM employee_progress WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, progress_status FROM employee_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Not Started' ORDER BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM employee_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, completion_date FROM employee_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' AND completion_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY completion_date
SELECT * FROM Employee
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee
SELECT employee_name, progress FROM Employee ORDER BY progress DESC
SELECT * FROM Development_Goal WHERE goal_status='In Progress'
SELECT goal_description, start_date, end_date FROM Development_Goal WHERE employee_id=1
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(progress) AS total_progress FROM Employee;
SELECT E.employee_name, G.goal_description FROM Employee E JOIN Development_Goal G ON E.employee_id = G.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, MAX(progress) AS highest_progress FROM Employee GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM employee_goals;
SELECT employee_id, goal_name FROM employee_goals WHERE progress = TRUE;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM goal_updates WHERE update_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT goal_name, progress FROM employee_goals WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM employee_goals WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT goal_name, progress FROM employee_goals WHERE progress = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department FROM employee_profiles WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, goal_name, deadline FROM employee_goals WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT eu.employee_id, eu.update_description, eu.update_date, eg.goal_name FROM goal_updates eu JOIN employee_goals eg ON eu.employee_id = eg.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT goal_id, description, deadline, progress FROM goals ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT name, start_date FROM employees WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT department_id, name, manager_id FROM departments WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT e.name, d.name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.name WHERE d.manager_id = 1;
SELECT g.description, p.progress FROM goals g LEFT JOIN progress_tracking p ON g.goal_id = p.goal_id;
SELECT d.name AS department, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS num_employees FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.name GROUP BY d.name;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProgress;
SELECT employee_id, goal_description FROM EmployeeGoals WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM Department ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT supervisor_name, department_name FROM Supervisor JOIN Department ON Supervisor.department_id = Department.department_id;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE supervisor_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProgress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT employee_id, goal_description FROM EmployeeGoals WHERE target_completion_date > NOW();
SELECT Employee.employee_name, Department.department_name FROM Employee JOIN Department ON Employee.department = Department.department_name;
SELECT goal_description, progress FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress BETWEEN 50 AND 75;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
